title: Socially Shared Regulation Learning Scaffolding Strategies for Online Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital tool proficiency and intermediate-level social studies curriculum comprehension
context.additional_context: Team project execution in a digital device (tablet/laptop) provision environment: Weekly 3-hour face-to-face classes + parallel online collaborative activities

learning_goals: Learners can specify role allocation and scheduling strategies using the socially shared regulation of learning framework when establishing 4-week team projects
Learners can maintain balanced participation (with each team member speaking at least twice) and foster positive work environments during team meetings using digital collaboration tools
Learners can objectively analyze individual contributions through a peer assessment system during the end-of-semester team project evaluation and reflect them in the final report.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
